## AllowedFormStateSelector type

A union of eligible form state selectors

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type AllowedFormStateSelector<TValueType, TForm extends object, TInputState extends object> = FormStateSelector<DeepPartial<TForm>, Partial<TInputState>, TValueType, string, keyof TInputState> | FormStateObserverSelector<DeepPartial<TForm>, Partial<TInputState>, TValueType, string, keyof TInputState> | TValueType;
```
<b>References:</b> [FormStateSelector](./dynamic-forms.formstateselector.md)<!-- -->, [FormStateObserverSelector](./dynamic-forms.formstateobserverselector.md)
